name: The services provide for design
text: The name of my project is Computer Upgrade. There are many pages like Home, Home , Dashboard, Blogs, Login and Dashboard user page (Add a review, My order, My Profile) and Admin Page (Manage All Order , Manage Product, Add Product) The first page is called the home page. In which you can see the essence of everything. In Dashboard, you can see payment products as per your need and if you go to card payment, you can add review. There is a page called . In which Hail has been secured
